name: Chase (itch) (Renva)
description:
A casual split-screen battle game for you and your friends to mess around with! Enjoy a variety of maps, accessories and secrets. 

Ever wanted to trick a friend into a crate rigged with explosives? Ever wanted to deflect an electric bolt in mid-air using a sword? Ever wanted to leap into hot burning goop, pull off a fiery escape and live to tell the tale? No? Well, do it anyway.
